name: nctest-nginx
author: OB
summary: Installs, generates a self-signed certificate and configures NGINX to use SSL, create a couple of redirects according to the test exercise, and also create & remove a forward proxy and format log files as per requested.
description: Installs, generates a self-signed certificate and configures NGINX to use SSL, create a couple of redirects according to the test exercise, and also create & remove a forward proxy and format log files as per requested. Tested only on CentOS 7.
